statements: SELECT * FROM rental_property_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT property_id, property_address, sale_price FROM rental_property_sales WHERE sale_price > 50000 ORDER BY sale_price DESC
SELECT buyer_name, seller_name FROM rental_property_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT seller_name, sale_price FROM rental_property_sales WHERE property_id = 3
SELECT * FROM rental_property_sales WHERE buyer_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM rental_property_sales WHERE sale_price > 50000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT property_id, sale_price, buyer_name FROM rental_property_sales WHERE buyer_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT seller_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM rental_property_sales GROUP BY seller_name HAVING total_sales > 2
SELECT seller_name, AVG(sale_price) AS avg_sale_price FROM rental_property_sales GROUP BY seller_name ORDER BY avg_sale_price DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_property_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_name, sale_price FROM rental_properties WHERE sale_price > 500000;
SELECT property_name, sale_date FROM rental_properties ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type FROM rental_properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT market_value, forecasted_price FROM market_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT property_id, property_name, sale_price FROM rental_properties WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type FROM rental_properties WHERE property_type = 'Single Family' ORDER BY property_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, property_id, market_value, forecasted_price FROM market_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, property_id, analysis_date, market_value, forecasted_price FROM market_analysis WHERE market_value BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, sale_price, sale_date, property_type FROM rental_properties WHERE property_type IN ('Apartment', 'Condo') AND sale_price < 80000 ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties;
SELECT property_id, address, city FROM rental_properties;
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, contact_number FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, property_id, seller_id, buyer_id, transaction_date FROM property_transactions;
SELECT * FROM rental_properties WHERE city='New York';
SELECT property_id, address, state FROM rental_properties ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT address, city, state, sale_price FROM rental_properties WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT rental_properties.property_id, address, owner_name, contact_number FROM rental_properties JOIN property_owners ON rental_properties.property_id = property_owners.property_id;

SELECT property_id, transaction_id, sale_price, transaction_date FROM rental_properties JOIN property_transactions ON rental_properties.property_id = property_transactions.property_id WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_property_sales;
SELECT sale_price, property_type FROM rental_property_sales WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT sale_date, sale_price FROM rental_property_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type FROM rental_property_sales WHERE sale_price > 500000 ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT city, state, neighborhood FROM property_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM rental_property_sales;
SELECT property_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM rental_property_sales WHERE sale_price > 100000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT agent_name, agency_name, contact_info FROM property_agents WHERE agent_id = 1;
SELECT city, state, zipcode, neighborhood FROM property_locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT property_id, market_trend, forecasted_price FROM market_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM property_sales;
SELECT property_id, sale_price, location FROM property_sales WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT sale_date, sale_price FROM property_sales ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT property_id, COUNT(property_id) AS num_sales FROM property_sales GROUP BY property_id;
SELECT * FROM property_details WHERE bedrooms >= 3 AND bathrooms >= 2;
SELECT property_id, sale_date, sale_price FROM property_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_id, year_built, square_feet FROM property_details WHERE bedrooms >= 3 AND bathrooms >= 2 ORDER BY square_feet DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_id, market_value, market_demand FROM market_analysis WHERE market_value > 500000 ORDER BY market_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_id, forecast_date, predicted_price FROM price_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY forecast_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT property_id, trend_date, trend_description FROM property_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%hot market%' ORDER BY trend_date DESC LIMIT 5;
